briefTitle: A Study of Cardiac Safety in Patients With HER2 Positive Early Breast Cancer Treated With Herceptin
officialTitle: An Observational Study of Cardiac Events in Patients With HER2 Positive Early Breast Cancer Treated With Herceptin
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence of symptomatic congestive heart failure\n(CHF) using New York Heart Association class II, III and IV, and cardiac death
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients who are considered candidates to receive Herceptin for this indication

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients for whom Herceptin is contraindicated
